diskText:
<?php
	require "../inc/db-connect.php";
	$strCallsign = $_POST["callsign"];
	if(strlen($strCallsign) == 5) {
		$strCallsign = $strCallsign . " ";
	}
	$result = pg_prepare($con, 'test_registered', "Select count(*) from members where upper(call_sign) = $1");
	$result = pg_execute($con, 'test_registered', array(strtoupper($strCallsign)));
	echo json_encode(pg_fetch_all($result));
?>

<?php
	require "../inc/db-connect.php";
	$strCallsign = $_POST["callsign"];
	if(strlen($strCallsign) == 5) {
		$strCallsign = $strCallsign . " ";
	}
	$result = pg_prepare($con, "validate_call", "Select call, first_name, last_name, street, city, province, postal_code from ic_call where call = $1");
	$result = pg_execute($con, "validate_call", array(strtoupper($strCallsign)));
	echo json_encode(pg_fetch_all($result));

text:
<?php
	require "../inc/db-connect.php";
	$strCallsign = $_POST["callsign"];
	if(strlen($strCallsign) == 5) {
		$strCallsign = $strCallsign . " ";
	}
	$result = pg_prepare($con, "validate_call", "Select call, first_name, last_name, street, city, province, postal_code from ic_call where call = $1");
	$result = pg_execute($con, "validate_call", array(strtoupper($strCallsign)));
	echo json_encode(pg_fetch_all($result));
?>
